Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to protests/march near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to protests/march near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Foster
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark: due to, parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route due to a parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.
